hero.title: Effortlessly Organize Your Event Invitations
hero.subtitle: Upload your names list and design, and let our platform generate professional, personalized invitations with QR codes for everyone!

premium.title: Create Perfect Invitations in Minutes
premium.desc1: Smart tools to automate guest management, personalize designs, and generate QR-coded invitations effortlessly.
premium.desc2: Save time, impress your guests, and handle your event like a pro.

step1.title: Event Info
step1.quote: Enter the event name and date. This sets up the basic information for all invitations.

step2.title: Upload Excel
step2.quote: Upload the Excel file containing each guest's name and email. The platform will use this to personalize invitations.

step3.title: Upload Design
step3.quote: Upload the invitation or design image. Ensure it is high quality and matches the theme of your event.

step4.title: Customize Layout
step4.quote: Place boxes on the design to map each guest's name and QR code. Adjust the font color, size, and position. Save and submit the layout.

step5.title: Download ZIP
step5.quote: Download the final file (ZIP) containing all personalized invitations ready to share or print.

footer.desc: Effortless invitation management. Personalized event invites with QR verification – all in one place.

item1.title: What is this platform used for?
item1.content: This platform helps you generate personalized event invitations with each guest’s name and a unique QR code for verification. It's perfect for weddings, conferences, or official events.

item2.title: What file formats are supported?
item2.content: You can upload your guest list in Excel format (.xlsx) and your invitation design as a PNG or JPG image.

item3.title: Can I choose where to place the guest name and QR code?
item3.content: Yes, during the setup process, you can draw boxes on your uploaded design to specify where each guest’s name and QR code should appear.

item4.title: How does QR verification work during the event?
item4.content: The platform generates a unique QR for every guest. You can scan these QR codes using your device camera to check and verify attendance at the event.

item5.title: Is there a limit on the number of invitations I can create?
item5.content: You can generate hundreds of invitations in one go. All the final images will be packed in a downloadable ZIP file for easy access.
